skill.name: lead-research-assistant
skill.description: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for target companies, and providing actionable contact strategies. Perfect for sales, business development, and marketing professionals.
skill.summary: Researches and identifies qualified business leads using web search and company data analysis.
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Static analysis detected pattern matches that are false positives. Network access is legitimate for lead research functionality. External command references are Markdown code formatting, not execution. The skill performs standard business research using web search tools.

content.value_statement: Finding qualified leads manually wastes time. This skill automates company research, identifies prospects matching your ideal customer profile, and provides contact strategies for your sales team.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes your product or service to define ideal customer criteria
Searches for companies matching your target profile
Researches company details including size, industry, and location
Identifies decision makers and contact information when available
Provides actionable outreach strategies for each lead
limitations: Does not access paid databases or CRM systems
Contact information quality depends on publicly available sources
Cannot verify if leads have been contacted before
Results may vary based on web search availability

use_cases.title: Startup Founder Finds Enterprise Prospects
use_cases.description: A founder needs to find 50 mid-market software companies in the healthcare sector to pitch their API solution.

use_cases.title: Sales Rep Builds Targeted Campaign List
use_cases.description: A sales representative needs to research 20 companies that recently raised funding and might need consulting services.

use_cases.title: Marketing Team Qualifies Lead Segments
use_cases.description: A marketing team needs to understand the geographic and industry distribution of their current lead database.
use_cases.target_user: Marketing managers and business development professionals

prompt_templates.title: Basic Lead Research
prompt_templates.prompt: Research leads for a [product/service description]. My ideal customer is [describe target audience]. Find [number] companies that match this profile.
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new lead research project

prompt_templates.title: Competitive Analysis Research
prompt_templates.prompt: Find companies using [competitor name] in [industry/region]. Research their company details and identify who might be open to switching solutions.

prompt_templates.title: Funding-Based Lead Discovery
prompt_templates.prompt: Find [number] companies that raised funding in the last [time period]. Research their current needs and identify decision makers for [your product category].

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive Lead Profile Research
prompt_templates.prompt: Research the following leads in detail: [list of companies]. For each company provide: company size, recent news, technology stack, and suggested contact strategy.

output_examples.input: Research leads for a project management software targeting tech startups with 20-100 employees in the Austin area.
output: Recent news: Series A funding announced Q3 2024
Tech stack: React, AWS, Slack integration
Contact strategy: Reach out to ops@techflow.io mentioning Slack integration compatibility
Recent news: Expanding to new office location
Contact strategy: Use LinkedIn to connect with operations team

best_practices: Define your ideal customer profile clearly before starting research
Use specific criteria like industry, company size, and location for better results
Combine multiple research requests for comprehensive coverage
Verify contact information before sending outreach messages
anti_patterns: Requesting personal information about individuals not publicly available
Using the skill to scrape data from websites with robots.txt restrictions
Assuming all research results are accurate without verification
Cold outreach without personalizing the message to each lead

faq.question: What sources does this skill use for research?
faq.answer: The skill uses web search and publicly available company information including websites, news articles, and business directories.

faq.question: How accurate is the contact information?
faq.answer: Contact information is sourced from publicly available channels. Always verify email addresses before sending outreach.

faq.question: Can this skill access LinkedIn or CRM data?
faq.answer: No. The skill only accesses information through web search and cannot log into paid platforms or CRM systems.

faq.question: How many leads can I research at once?
faq.answer: The skill can research multiple leads in a single request. For large lists, consider breaking into batches of 10-20 companies.

faq.question: Does this skill verify if leads are still interested?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides research based on publicly available information. Interest level must be determined through direct outreach.

faq.question: Can I export the research results?
faq.answer: Results are provided in a structured format that can be copied to your CRM or spreadsheet manually.
